Class Notebook

java.lang.Object
  Notebook

public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object

Stores "notes". Notes are objects of the Note class

Constructor Summary
Notebook()
          Construct an empty notebook
 
Method Summary
 void deleteNote(int index)
           
 void insertNote(int index, Note n)
          Inserts a Note into the Notebook in the position supplied as a parameter.
 int numberOfNotes()
           
 Note retrieveNote(int index)
          Retrieves the note stored in the position supplied as a parameter.
 void showAllNotes()
          Show all the notes contained in the note book.
 void storeNote(Note note)
          Store a new note into the notebook by appending it to the end of the current list of notes

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Notebook

public Notebook()
Construct an empty notebook

Method Detail

deleteNote

public void deleteNote(int index)

insertNote

public void insertNote(int index,
                       Note n)
Inserts a Note into the Notebook in the position supplied as a parameter. The parameter must be >= 0 and < the number of notes in the notebook. If the index parameter is out of this range no action will be taken

Parameters:
the - index at which the note should be inserted, the Note to be inserted

numberOfNotes

public int numberOfNotes()
Returns:
The number of notes currently in the notebook.

retrieveNote

public Note retrieveNote(int index)
Retrieves the note stored in the position supplied as a parameter. The parameter must be >= 0 and < the number of notes in the notebook. If the index parameter is out of this range null will be returned

Returns:
the note

showAllNotes

public void showAllNotes()
Show all the notes contained in the note book.

storeNote

public void storeNote(Note note)
Store a new note into the notebook by appending it to the end of the current list of notes

Parameters:
note - The note to be stored.
